a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTDengueNoScreenLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Dengue.3 doses without pre-vaccination screening) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a dengue vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule without pre-vaccination screening [when pre-vaccination screening is not feasible and in areas with recent documentation of seroprevalence rates of at least 80% by age 9 years] * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTDengueNoScreenLogic

def.name: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 9 years

def.name: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is more than 45 years

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Case 3

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One dengue primary series dose was administered"
"Client's age is between 9 years and 45 years"
"The latest dengue dose was administered less than 6 months ago"

def.name: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for dengue vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first dengue dose as client's age is less than 9 years. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first dengue dose as client's age is more than 45 years. Check for any vaccines due.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second dengue dose as latest dengue dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with third dengue dose as latest dengue vaccine was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.

def.name: Client is due for dengue vaccination Guidance

a:t.value: Client is due for dengue vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first dengue dose as no dengue doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.
